title: Volokh on Where Protesters Can be During Inauguration (Audio)
itunes:title: Volokh on Where Protesters Can be During Inauguration (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Eugene Volokh, a Law Professor at the University of California\u0010discusses where protesters can be during the President inauguration parade. He Speaks with June Grasso, Michael Best, and Greg Stohr on "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
